column4: How can I access a usb storage device, such as a camera? Also, my computer has slots for the memory devices used in camera's, could anyone tell me where those are located?
If the camera acts as a USB mass-storage device, just plug it in and it should auto-mount and you'll see the files
just like a flash drive or whatever
Some cameras don't act as mass-storage devices, but they use a protocol called PTP instead...  for that you need PTP-capable transfer software, like F-Spot (I think) or gthumb
